channel.title: "Missing" texture on the Residue Processing loading screen
channel.description: Well, when I load up the beginning of the chapter [i]Residue Processing[/i], the "blurry" loading shot is just the pink and black Steam missing texture. Is this a bug, or what?

item.title: "Missing" texture on the Residue Processing loading screen
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
Nice find, I’ve fixed it now for the future.

Read full topic
item.source: "Missing" texture on the Residue Processing loading screen

item.title: "Missing" texture on the Residue Processing loading screen
item.dc:creator: ysrael214
item.description:
imadoofus:

Well, when I load up the beginning of the chapter Residue Processing, the “blurry” loading shot is just the pink and black Steam missing texture. Is this a bug, or what?

Check materials/console/background10.vmt

The base texture is written as

“$basetexture” “console/background010”

change it to:

“$basetexture” “console/background10”

Read full topic
item.source: "Missing" texture on the Residue Processing loading screen
